name: codex-project
description: Codex - Sistema de Generación de Códigos QR y Barras

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:rust"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:rust
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:rust
